title: Disallow SORT options BY and GET when cluster is enabled

comments_data.body: There should still be a way for the client lib to proxy that command option.

Eligible for close.  Recently fixed by https://github.com/antirez/redis/commit/03344196f375761a90fa1429ff617a12fb1f3ff6 and https://github.com/antirez/redis/commit/3e1d77267759083fa0d011193a2ad5713dee72e3 and a few others.

(This issue was opened 839 days ago (2 years, 3 months, 16 days)!)
